amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate that failing to address the financial condition of Social Security will result in massive debt, deep benefit cuts and tax increases.

vote.text: Amendment SA 150 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 43. Record Vote Number: 48.

action.text: Amendment SA 150 proposed by Senator DeMint. (consideration: CR S2685-2686, S2692-2693; text: CR S2686) To express the sense of the Senate that failing to address the financial condition of Social Security will result in massive debt, deep benefit cuts and tax increases.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 150 proposed by Senator DeMint.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 150 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 43. Record Vote Number: 48.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 150 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 43. Record Vote Number: 48.
